title: Key-Binding issues?
body:
So, I started a game and for some reason my key bindings wouldn't work, which is a problem as I don't use the mouse for anything but walking usually. Considering I'm using my keyboard to type this, I don't think it was an issue with my keyboard. Also, I use the default setup (Q-W-E-R) so it's not a result of me changing keys either. It also certainly isn't because of my ping, as I live right near the NA server.

 I don't want to start another game as I don't want to lose due to something that is out of my control, so any help on the matter would be extremely appreciated.

replies.body:
Hmmmmm my first guess is maybe your keybinds didn't load correctly from the server or possibly got erased entirely. Let's try to give those a quick hard reset using the steps below.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
